Title: What is the purpose of the connect function in Redux
Answer_1: To create a new store instance
Answer_2: To connect a component to the store
Answer_3: To create middleware for the store
Rigth_Answer: To create middleware for the store

Title: What is the purpose of the useRef hook in React
Answer_1: To access a mutable value that persists across renders

Title: What is the difference between React elements and React components in React?
Answer_2: React elements are plain objects that describe what to render, while React components are functions or classes that produce React elements
Answer_3: React components are plain objects that describe what to render, while React elements are functions or classes that produce React components

Title: What is the purpose of the useMemo hook in React?
Answer_1: To memoize a value, and recompute it only when its dependencies change
